sarc.name: Name
sarc.login-failed-msg: Login failed, please check your name and password
sarc.bio-msg: Please provide the bio. information for accurate assesment.
sarc.bind-msg: This card is Associated to you, please proceed tests.
sarc.card-msg: User crad reder to get card no

parq.p1q1: Q1: Has your doctor ever said that you have a heart condition OR high blood pressure?
parq.p1q1a: Q1A: If you answered YES to the Question #1 (above) please select the appropriate condition. Select ALL that apply.
parq.p1q2: Q2: Do you feel pain in your chest at rest, during your daily activities of living, OR when you do physical activity?
parq.p1q3: Q3: Do you lose balance because of dizziness OR have you lost consciousness in the last 12 months? Please answer NO if your dizziness was associated with over-breathing (including during vigorous exercise).
parq.p1q4: Q4: Have you ever been diagnosed with another chronic medical condition (other than heart disease or high blood pressure)?
parq.p2q5: Q5: Are you currently taking prescribed medications for a chronic medical condition?
parq.p1q6: Q6: Do you currently have (or have had within the past 12 months) a bone, joint, or soft tissue (muscle, ligament, or tendon) problem that could be made worse by becoming more physically active? Please answer NO if you had a problem in the past, but it does not limit your current ability to be physically active.
parq.p1q7: Q7: Has your doctor ever said that you should only do medically supervised physical activity?
